game.name: Universal Car Ball
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, HDR 사용 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Car Soccer eSports meets true team management and game customization! Play the way you enjoy it most and run private leagues/teams/events players can queue directly in game with your organization. Our goal is to build communities that are able to self manage and bring fun back to Car Ball <3
